docs.text: warren beatty returns to the screens in the funniest , craziest and hard hitting movie in his career .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: based on a story concocted by himself , and also written by beatty , bulworth gives a good insight of what beatty thinks of the american government system .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: beatty stars as senator jay bulworth , who's going through a nervous breakdown .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: after hiring someone to kill him , he completely changes his campaign strategy and tells the honest truth about what's _really_ happening in american politics , much to the annoyance of assistant dennis murphy ( platt . )
docs.label: positive

docs.text: instead of everyone hating him , the american public love him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: however , inside his party , more people want to kill him than just the hired assassin .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and he also strikes a relationship with black girl nina ( berry . )
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's remarkable that this film was released at all .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: much more open than the rather subdued primary colours , bulworth barely gives the american politic system a good name .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the outrageous remarks bulworth makes to his potential voters are very funny , and also somewhat true .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's great that beatty isn't afraid to let loose on a subject .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: talking of beatty , he's excellent in the role of the demented senator , clearing having fun .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and seeing warren beatty have fun is a rare sight indeed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: even in dick tracy , he was the most straighten face actor .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ( then again , he was the only characters face we could completely see . )
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film gives an opportunity for the 61 year old beatty to indulge in some rapping , which he does with gusto ( and also quite well . )
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and seeing beatty as a 'homeboy' has to be seen to be believed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's nice to see that beatty can laugh at himself .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: second best is oliver platt as the flustered , coke snorting assistant , who goes over the top when he finally snaps .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: halle berry is fine , and sexy , as the intellectual nina , who comes to like the senator .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: also popping up in the supporting cast is paul sorvino wit h a strange accent , laurie metcalf as the exact same characters she's also played , and christine baranski of cybill fame as bullworths wife , who all contribute to the fun .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and , this being a political film , the ubiquitous larry king makes an appearance , as , * shock * , himself .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the writing and directing , both by beatty , are above par .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the direction is very nearly sitcom like , but suits the film perfectly , and both the politics are gangland parts are handled well .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the script is funny , and the raps are actually well produced and humorous , and quite clever .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they're not cringe inducing , at least .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the script makes many points about society in america today , and isn't afraid to make any bold statements about what is a flawed system .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: best of all , the film is thought provoking , but directed and written in such a way that the film feels as light as a feather , and is very entertaining .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there's also a great rap soundtrack with some well chosen tunes .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: bulworth is a film with many advantages , and few flaws .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: perhaps it could be somewhat embarrassing to see a 61 year old man rapping , but beatty does it so well it's irrelevant .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in fact , there's very little against bulworth , except for the language which is very heavy , but then again it should be expected .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: bulworth , then , is well worth watching .
docs.label: positive

docs.label: positive

docs.text: " you know , for kids " - norville barnes
docs.label: positive
